content: What is the usual process for finding reviewers for LLVM patches? I'm having trouble getting https://reviews.llvm.org/D120382 reviewed.
Or for a more extreme example (though not Rust related), https://reviews.llvm.org/D104931 hasn't been reviewed in 8 months.
In practice there are maintainers of the subsystems who aren't always easy to discover, even though the codeowners mechanism exists in LLVM
For Arm changesets you'll most likely want folks who work at Arm.
Pinging people and/or shouting at IRC is also something I've done in the past.
Is IRC better for shouting than Discord? (I only know about the LLVM Discord, I don't know where I would look for LLVM developers on IRC today.)
